text: My first visit experience with Dr Zhang is great. She is very gentle when doing teeth scaling and very patient in explain to me about my teeth.

I have been going for my treatments with Dr Wan Hui Wei and her assistants  for a few months. They have been very caring and have tried to make my visits as comfortable as possible. And Dr Wan is very professional in treating my teeth and gums.
Dr Timothy was patient and well-versed with the Invisalign system. Dr Eric was fantastic fast with the cleaning. Joanne at the reception was very patient and accomodating. Very polite. All is good!

Dr. Wan Hui Wei is an amazing dentist who treats her patients with a lot of care and patience, and a big big smile (even though she is wearing a mask). My gum condition improved tremendously because of her treatments and gum care tips. I will recommend her to anyone around me in particular those who are afraid to visit a dentist and with a gum condition. (:

I’ve been seeing Dr Wan Hui Wei for almost 1 year, and she has been super kind and friendly, making me feel at ease throughout the entire appointment.  She’s also very meticulous in her work and will ensure that you comfortable throughout the entire procedure. I had undergone a gum graft surgery and the whole procedure and recovery process has been very smooth with no issues! The dental nurses and assistants are also super welcoming and friendly, and will gladly answer any questions/queries you may have. I highly recommend coming here if you need any dental assistance! :)
